lines.line: What do we have here? One of those singer bot clones?
I have a name, you know!
Didn’t think your kind would even have enough of a soul to be sent to the afterlife.
I’m Eva, and I’m here to spread joy through song!
I’m sure the other dead are going to be delighted.
Anyone can appreciate a good song, no matter how down they might be! My performances will lift their spirits!
I wonder how many more times I’ll be greeted with that look.
You’re the one who did all this. You’re the reason I’m... like this! Why did you come back?
I never wanted things to end how they did. Such a waste. I’m here to kill IRIS… to set this world back to the way it was.
Really? I have to come with you! We can stop IRIS together!
What use would I have for a robot pop star?
Singing and dancing aren’t the only things I’m good at.
